title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 5 great Casascius lots up for grabs:LOT 1: 2011 Casascius non-denominated bearer bar, gold plated alloy"1GCp1FFP"*Bar is still covered with the original plastic wrap it came in*Also comes with original envelope and address strip*The plating on the back does show some signs of "bubbling" as seen in the picture below*The rest of the bar seems to be in good condition and marks seen are on the plastic overlay*Bar is 1 of 207 similar made bars, and 1 of 123 still active/non-redeemed adressesLOT 2: 2011 Casascius 25BTC coin, gold plated alloy, Redeemed"1Go2eqjd"LOT 3: 2014 Casascius St.Petersburg bitcoin Bowl coin, silver/gilt 1oz*Shows slight signs of toning around the rim. LOT 4: 2012 Casascius 1BTC blank x3*Will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions. Winners will select coins in order of win*Key is attached with a clear overlay sticker that covers the entire back of the coin, "1CSY9Zqu"LOT 5: 2012 Casascius 5BTC blankLOT 1LOT 2LOT 3LOT 4 & LOT 5STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 21th, 2022, 15:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: TheNovemberMan
comments.body: Lot #1 - .01BTCLot #2 - .01BTCLot #3 - .01BTCLot #4 - .01BTCLot #5 - .01BTCWith lot #4, are you bidding on each of the 3 coins?Thanks!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: TheNovemberMan on November 16, 2022, 06:19:55 PMLot #1 - .01BTCLot #2 - .01BTCLot #3 - .01BTCLot #4 - .01BTCLot #5 - .01BTCWith lot #4, are you bidding on each of the 3 coins?Thanks!Yes, you would bid "per coin", so a valid bid would be Lot 4: "1 @ xxBTC" or 2 @ xxBTC or 3 @ xxBTCWinners will select coins in order of win

comments.author: TheNovemberMan
comments.body: Ok, in edition to my bids above,Lot #4: 3 @ .01BTC
